Class CardImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardImage

  • public class CardImage
extends Object
    CardImage class takes a Card Object and determines the image to be used by WarGui.java

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String imageName 
      private String RANK 
      private String SUIT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardImage()
      Default Constructor take no parameters and defaults RANK to 1 and SUIT to "H" (Strings).
      CardImage(Card card)
      Alternate Constructor takes a Card object to determine the string value of the Card's rank and suit

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String determineImage()
      determineImage method determines the image based on the values from getSuitName and getRankName methods
      private String getRankName()
      getRankName method determines the first letter of the RANK string (used to determine image)
      private String getSuitName()
      getSuitName method determines the first letter of the SUIT string (used to determine image)
      void setCard(Card card)
      SetCard method sets a new card to determine rank and suit of for image.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public CardImage()
        Default Constructor take no parameters and defaults RANK to 1 and SUIT to "H" (Strings).

    • Method Detail

      • setCard

        public void setCard(Card card)
        SetCard method sets a new card to determine rank and suit of for image.
        Parameters:
        card - The Card object to determine image of.

      • getRankName

        private String getRankName()
        getRankName method determines the first letter of the RANK string (used to determine image)
        Returns:
        String The letter of the rank

      • getSuitName

        private String getSuitName()
        getSuitName method determines the first letter of the SUIT string (used to determine image)
        Returns:
        String The letter of the suit

      • determineImage

        public String determineImage()
        determineImage method determines the image based on the values from getSuitName and getRankName methods
        Returns:
        String The name of the image file that will be used.
